RYANAIR_TEXT_1: We go to Finland every Wednesday and Saturday so that you can catch Ryanair flights.
RYANAIR_TEXT_2: Stops can be done on every possible place on the way from Lappeenranta (railway station, city center, Prisma).
RYANAIR_TEXT_3: Wednesday - We are going from Saint-Petersburg at 3pm from "Cernaya Recka, Primorsky pr., 15. ". At 9:40pm we meet at the airport and go back to Saint-Petersburg.
